nodes.bodyText: so, all the db objects will be processed 3 times - once for each group?  even thought maybe only some of them belong to certain group ...
well, if I understand it right, buildCommonModel will only add the "target" objects to the pdm, so its not necessarilly "all" the db objects.
it's not necessarily all, but yes, it'll potentially process three times, applying only where the group matches
